name: 3rd World congress on Pharmaceutics, Formulations & Novel Drug Delivery Systems
content: On behalf of organizing committee of PHARMACEUTICAL CONFERENCES 2023 we welcome all the speakers and delegates from around the world to join us to the line-up for the conference of 2nd World congress on Pharmaceutics, Formulations & Novel Drug Delivery Systems to be held on February 20-21, 2023 Las Vegas, USA. We are typically organizing this conference to present a more capitalist lookout to researchers, academics, pharmaceutical companies, and health professionals, students, to come together, to learn, evolve, discuss, share and get an idea of the various advances that best reflect to “Explore The New Inventions In Pharmaceutical Sciences”. The following are the sessions and tracks of the conference. Track 1:Pharmaceutical Sciences: Academic and Industry Overview Track 2:Pharmacognosy and Phytochemistry Track 3:Pharmaceutical Chemistry Track 4:Drug Discovery, Design & Development: Challenges and Approaches Track 5:Nanotechnology in Pharmaceuticals Track 6:Pharmaceutical Manufacturing Track 7:Novel Drug Delivery Systems Track 8:Nanomedicine and Biomedical Applications Track 9:Pharmaceutical Analysis Track 10:Pharmaceutical Microbiology Track 11:Industrial and Physical Pharmacy Pharma Conference| Pharma Conferences 2023| Pharma Events| Pharma Congress| Pharma Conferences| Pharma Trade Meets| Pharma Congresses| Medical Conferences In Pharma| Education & Training Conferences In Pharma| Pharma Workshops, Seminars|
